ingredients: 4 cups cubed watermelon, 4 cups fresh baby spinach, torn, 2 large avocados - peeled, pitted, and diced,   +   1/4 cup walnut oil,   +   1/4 cup olive oil, 1  lime, juiced,   +   1/2 teaspoon sweet paprika
nutrition: Total Fat 32g 41%, Saturated Fat 4g 21%, Sodium 24mg 1%, Total Carbohydrate 18g 6%, Dietary Fiber 8g 27%, Total Sugars 7g, Protein 3g, Vitamin C 27mg 134%, Calcium 42mg 3%, Iron 2mg 8%, Potassium 700mg 15%
